content.faq5_a: We support multiple global languages including English (US, UK, AU), Spanish, French, German, Japanese, Chinese, Korean, Portuguese, Italian, Russian, and Hindi.
content.faq6_q: How natural do the voices sound?
content.faq6_a: We use advanced Neural Text-to-Speech technology which produces voices that are nearly indistinguishable from human speech, with proper intonation and rhythm.
content.faq7_a: We do not enforce a strict daily limit on the number of files you can generate, making it perfect for bulk content creation.
content.faq8_q: Can I adjust the speed or pitch?
content.faq8_a: Currently, the tool generates speech at a standardized, natural conversational rate optimized for clarity. Advanced controls may be added in future updates.
